articles.author: Mark Young
articles.title: "They/Them" Is An LGBTQ+ Horror Masterpiece
articles.description: The film is a masterful queer psychological thriller dressed up as a slasher flick that will scare you in ways you'll never see coming.
articles.content: When most people heard this was a horror film set at a queer conversion camp, a setting attached with its own real-life horrors, a moment of hesitation set in. While films like But I'm a Cheerleader … [+1020 chars]
